Reviews.Title: cheap
Reviews.Author: B. Johnson
Reviews.Content: First pair was non functional on IR and could not see in the dark. Replacements work OK but its obvious these are not long term units. Will be surprised if these last a year because of poor quality control Remember,You get what you pay for!

Reviews.Title: One Year Life
Reviews.Author: Dalone59
Reviews.Content: I don't expect an electronic item to last forever but I certainly expect more than one year. I purchased the complete 4-Camera QSee Package from a local store in Trinidad, after 10 months two cameras failed. The option to return only the cameras was not available from the supplier, and it was too much of a hassle to pull down all the wiring to return the entire unit. So, I chose to buy two replacement cameras at Amazon.The replacement of the defective cameras were a snap, and I must add that the picture quality of the ones I bought were far better than the ones originally supplied. But here I am after 16 months writing a (poor) review of their life - kaput goes another camera!I would not recommend this product to anyone who is thinking about a camera system. It is cheaper the most other security systems and that is exactly what it is ... cheap!I give 2 stars - one for each year of service!

Reviews.Title: night vision was poor without additional lightning
Reviews.Author: Joe Swafford
Reviews.Content: with secondary lighting it is still grainy at 15'... had to upgrade cameras to 100' infared to get the coverage i was looking for

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Todd Wax
Reviews.Content: these cameras work great both day and night. easy to install. would definately recommend purchase and would by again if i need more

Reviews.Title: I like!!
Reviews.Author: rrader
Reviews.Content: Nice camera's for what I needed them for!! If you are looking for high quality picture especially at night then these are not what you need. But for close range they seem to be a good camera.

Reviews.Title: Great cameras
Reviews.Author: terry monroe
Reviews.Content: They are clear and easy to install. I have them in the front and back of my house. I can see what is happening when I am home and away

Reviews.Title: video is not great
Reviews.Author: TVRO
Reviews.Content: Day time is ok but video at night is not so good hard to see anything as no detail in video

Reviews.Title: for the price.. cant beat it...
Reviews.Author: galluccioant
Reviews.Content: if you want simple cameras that do a simple task... record... then they work as advertised. i have have my 2 cameras now for 2 years.. maybe longer.. not sure..i am on the jersey shore.. and the cameras went through what... 3 hurricanes.. sandy included...still working...i rest my case. hahaif you want the best... pay for the best and stop being stupid... for the price.. this product will suffice for non pro useif you are looking for top notch then no.. this is not it.. but it works for my needs

Reviews.Title: Wireless is the way to go....
Reviews.Author: Vicki Williamson
Reviews.Content: When I received these cameras, I already had two wireless security cameras installed at my home. I really did not think having wired cameras would be much of an issue. I was so wrong! Wired cameras are such a headache to install and do not offer the versatility of a wireless camera and though these cameras come with 60 ft of wiring... for my house that was not near enough. Moreover, the picture quality was not what I would call high quality and the night vision was disappointing as well. Needless to say, if you are looking for inexpensive cameras with sub-par video quality for the sake of perhaps deterring a potential criminal then these are the way to go. If you want a security system that creates a picture or video where you can actually identify all in it, this is not the camera for you.

Reviews.Title: Q-See cameras
Reviews.Author: Tim Miller
Reviews.Content: The color on these cameras are better than the ones that I had gotten from Comp USA in the 4 pack set a year earlier, but after it gets dark the cameras get distorted and are harder to see a clear image on.

Reviews.Title: after a year, my 5 cams are trouble free
Reviews.Author: Norman Cutter "alyosha10"
Reviews.Content: I installed these cams over a year ago in my small business, and all are working perfectly. They were easy and fun to install,..and hooked up to our Q See DVR with zero problems. I am back on amazon to buy a couple more to fill in the 'dark' area in my setup.There are more expensive cameras on the market, but these work fine. You can easily recognize people's faces, and the nite vision is very useful.All the cams have had zero problems, so that's 5 stars in my book.

Reviews.Title: they work
Reviews.Author: B. Hosters "stickinpoo2"
Reviews.Content: i got these and expected better quality for the price. the image looks fuzzy. still a good camera but i have paid less for cameras with a more clear image .

Reviews.Title: Awesome cameras
Reviews.Author: J. Parsons
Reviews.Content: I bought 3 of these two-packs. The first 4 cameras were great. They have great picture quality and the night vision does give at least the 40ft they claim. The 5th camera was DOA. Luckily I only needed 5 cameras for the job I was doing so I installed the 6th one in place of the DOA. I started an RMA with the manufacturer. They were excellent at communicating throughout the RMA process. about a week later I had a replacement camera and a Return ship tag for the DOA. Couldn't be happier with Q-See even with a dead camera.

Reviews.Title: If u want quality don't buy these
Reviews.Author: JOEL CURRY
Reviews.Content: When I bought these cameras I thought that i was getting a quality product.upon hooking these up to my DVR i realized that they were garbage and the night vision on themsuck as well. if you are looking for a good wired camera do not get these.the one good thing i  can say about these is that they are super easy to hook upand that is all i can say good about this product,. they only have 400 TV lines and i was under the impressionthat they were 600 tvl i don't know maybe it was me??and one of the cams is so out of focus that it hardly can be seen!!

Reviews.Title: They work
Reviews.Author: C. Grigalunas "CG"
Reviews.Content: Resolution is not awesome, but they work as advertised. Already had four of these cameras and needed a few more.

Reviews.Title: best prduct for cheap.
Reviews.Author: saif
Reviews.Content: works peefect. i installed it and works like a champ. and the shiping was faster thaan as they described. A+

Reviews.Title: can't ID
Reviews.Author: Terrell Deshotel
Reviews.Content: You aren't able to get a clear view of faces or images that aren't real close to the camera. Good night vision

Reviews.Title: q-see cameras
Reviews.Author: Bill Sewell
Reviews.Content: Excellent worked well right out of the box. Easy set up. All wires and cables includedEasy install. Would recommend purchase.

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: Keith of pa
Reviews.Content: Other places wanted$200.00 or better for a pair of cameras & wiresI got cams. Wires, mounting hardware, transformer for $89.00Now that's a deal!

Reviews.Title: Terrible Image quality vs CCD
Reviews.Author: khan95osu
Reviews.Content: I have 4 of these and 4 of the QSDS14273W CCD versions... the CCD ones are Wayyyyyy better.first, the field of view of these is tiny compared to the CCD ones.  Setting this up in the break room i could only get it to show the doorway, replacing with the QSDS14273W allowed me to see the entire room... i dont know exact numbers but it seems like this has a FOV of about 45 degrees, where the QSDS14273W has about 135 degrees.  Its that big of a difference.Night vision IQ is pathetic.  swapping for the QSDS14273W i noticed a huge difference in IQ.  i wish i had saved the images for a comparison!Daytime IQ is a little closer but still worse.I ended up returning these and replacing with 4 of these:[...]which a much much much better.

Reviews.Title: One camera DOA
Reviews.Author: Michael Gant
Reviews.Content: It could just be that the delivery person from OnTrac had thrown the box over my fence (I had the footage on my older security camera system) or it could be the build quality. I'm not sure why one of these cameras doesn't work and I procrastinated returning them so there isn't anything I can do about it now except leave this review.

Reviews.Title: Not what was advertised.
Reviews.Author: vton66
Reviews.Content: It doesn't work at night even indoors as it is advertised. I returned the first ones and received a similar pair that didn't work properly, either. I set 2 up outdoors and they were burned out in the first rain.  I have older ones of the same brand that work better and thought these would carry the same quality. If you need it for a parking lot, get a professional one. I wouldn't recommend.

ProductInfo.Features:
Compatible with any Q-See DVR
Weatherproof for indoor or outdoor use
Up to 40ft. of Night Vision per Camera
400 TV Lines Resolution per Camera
Includes cables, stands, and power supply
ProductInfo.Name: Q-See QSM1424C2 Indoor and Outdoor Security Cameras with 40 feet of Night Vision (2 pack)
